name: Franz Stassen - WWI - An das deutsche Volk unadjusted

desc.html:
Source file for File:Franz Stassen - WWI - An das deutsche Volk.png. A World War I German propaganda poster designed by Franz Strassen, quoting a speech by Kaiser Wilhelm, attacking the rejection of their peace offer, and claiming that their enemies seek nothing but to destroy the German naton, but that God is on their side, and they will remain undefeated.

A full translation is available here.

tags: images from the library of congress
